quoteText:
We don’t collect information from children under 13, and we don’t collect sensitive data.
How we share the information we collect
We share information to provide the service to you, to comply with your requests, or with our vendors.
We do not host advertising on GitHub and we do not sell your personal information.
title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you
tosdr.tldr: Per GitHub's terms: "We do not share, sell, rent, or trade User Personal Information with third parties for their commercial purposes. We do not disclose User Personal Information outside GitHub, except in the situations listed in this section or in the section below on Compelled Disclosure. We do share certain aggregated, non-personally identifying information with others about how our users, collectively, use GitHub, or how our users respond to our other offerings, such as our conferences or events. For example, we may compile statistics on the usage of open source licenses across GitHub. However, we do not sell this information to advertisers or marketers."
